title: Nest Buy – E-commerce Furniture Store
description: Developed a user-friendly e-commerce platform for furniture sales using HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and Bootstrap within an MVC framework. Focused on creating a dynamic catalog, shopping cart, and secure checkout process in a collaborative team environment.

title: EventAt – Event Management Platform
description: Developed an interactive platform for managing events using JavaScript, utilizing JSON for data handling. Implemented features for scheduling and seat management, ensuring a responsive and engaging user experience.

title: Movie Website
description: Developed a full-stack website for movies using Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
